record.description: Final arrangements are being made for the University of Chicago Washington Prom [which will be held] next Friday evening in the Congress Hotel Gold room. These members of the Prom committee may soon sit back and take it easy in anticipation of the affair. Left to right, seated: Jane Myers, Marion Elisberg, and Philomena Baker; standing: Betty Beale, and Pat Davis.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
